desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 13th European Conference on Ambient Intelligence, AmI 2017, held in Malaga, Spain, in April 2017.

details.authors: Andreas Braun, Reiner Wichert, Antonio Maña

title: Ambient Intelligence: 13th European Conference, AmI 2017, Malaga, Spain, April 26–28, 2017, Proceedings (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
